# RPM OSTree GUI

GUI application for managing RPMs via rpm-ostree.

# Installation

Note: For search to work you will need to install python-hawkey.

From PyPi:
```
pip3 install rpm-ostree-gui
```

From source:
```
git clone https://github.com/epiccakeking/rpm-ostree-gui
cd rpm-ostree-gui
pip3 install .
```
